member.name: T:Deveel.Filters.BinaryFilterModel
member.summary: A model that represents a binary filter

member.name: P:Deveel.Filters.BinaryFilterModel.Left
member.summary: The left side of the binary filter

member.name: P:Deveel.Filters.BinaryFilterModel.Right
member.summary: The right side of the binary filter

member.name: P:Deveel.Filters.BinaryFilterModel.BinaryData
member.summary: Extension data for the dynamic properties of the filter.

member.name: T:Deveel.Filters.FilterModel
member.summary: A model that describes a filter that is used to restrict a set of data.
member.remarks: This object defines a model that can be exchanged between services and clients and be serialized and deserialized safely.

member.name: T:Deveel.Filters.FunctionFilterModel
member.summary: Describes a function that is returning a boolean value and is used to filter a set of data.

member.name: P:Deveel.Filters.FunctionFilterModel.Instance
member.summary: The reference to the variable that is the instance object defining the function.

member.name: P:Deveel.Filters.FunctionFilterModel.Name
member.summary: The name of the function to invoke.

member.name: P:Deveel.Filters.FunctionFilterModel.Arguments
member.summary: An optional array of arguments to pass to the function.

member.name: T:Deveel.Filters.VariableNameAttribute
member.summary: An attribute that can be used to validate a string is a valid variable name for a filter.
